quote.text: We become what we think about.
quote.author: Earl Nightingale

quote.text: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
quote.author: Charles Swindoll

quote.text: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
quote.author: Alice Walker

quote.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quote.author: Buddha

quote.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quote.author: Chinese Proverb

quote.text: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quote.author: Socrates

quote.text: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quote.author: Woody Allen

quote.text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quote.author: Steve Jobs

quote.text: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
quote.author: Vince Lombardi

quote.text: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quote.author: Stephen Covey

quote.text: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
quote.author: Pablo Picasso

quote.text: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
quote.author: Henry Ford

quote.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quote.author: Frank Sinatra

quote.text: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quote.author: Anais Nin
